name: Godfire
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys or WSAD

Play as a "Godfire" and lose vision as you walk through water. Reignite yourself with torches, but be aware of spikes and patroling dwarves. Reach the end of 5 premade levels to complete the game.

Short game made by a single person in 16 work hours (not straight). I randomly chose 3 theme words from my list of words. 

Enjoy yourself and thanks for playing!
